item.title: ‘Real disruption’ for flights is yet to come if shutdown continues, DOT says
item.description: The Trump administration warned that travelers could face even worse delays and cancellations if Congress can't end the government shutdown this week.

item.title: Sonder to file bankruptcy — here's what to do if you booked a stay through Marriott
item.description: Shortly after Marriott announced the termination of its licensing agreement with Sonder Hotels, Sonder has declared bankruptcy.
